channel.title: Intercepting SMS Without Access to Target Phone?
channel.description:
Intercepting SMS without physical access to the device. I see posts claiming both that it *is possible*, and also that its *impossible*. The thing is, both sides try to sell me something. If it works, I don't mind paying for it. Just don't want to waste money on a scam.
Is there a way to intercept SMS this way? Doesn't have to be easy, just looking for a possibility.
Thanks

item.title: Intercepting SMS Without Access to Target Phone?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 121 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Intercepting SMS Without Access to Target Phone?
item.dc:creator: Raique
item.description:
Yes, you have to have a fake cell phone tower most known as IMSI-Catcher or a portable cellphone tower (most known as FemtoCell or MicroCell) (refer to the chosen vendor webpage for more information, they vary from ~$300 to ~$1000 irc).

one interesting video regarding the subject:

DEF CON 18 - Chris Paget - Practical Cellphone Spying

Read full topic
item.source: Intercepting SMS Without Access to Target Phone?
